title:

attachments.displayName:
#CENTENARY #HERITAGE #FOCUS_ON_ADAMAWA

In Adamawa State lies a world Heritage Site called the Sukur Cultural Landscape, inscribed in 1999 by UNESCO. The cultural adaptions of Sukur was not affected or changed by the colonial masters, and this was strong evidence leading to its inscription. UNESCO recognised this in its citation, “The cultural landscape of Sukur is eloquent testimony to a strong and continuing cultural tradition that has endured for many centuries.”

The serene of Sukur is amazing and the warm reception of its people is awesome. A vacation in Sukur is not a bad idea, because you will definitely have a feel of Nature and appreciate humanity.

#Nigeriacentenary #100KNaija #Iconicphotos #Tourism #Adamawastate #Sukurculturallandscape
